thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel, spa is wonderfully relaxing and good service - Review of St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: kmay555
title: Beautiful hotel, spa is wonderfully relaxing and good service
text:
Stayed on a Saturday and it was a first class hotel. We upgraded to the Grand Stair Case suite and it was worth the money. The staff were friendly, hotel is spotless and rooms are well stocked and appointed. We had a couples massage and therapists were really nice. My only criticism was that the room took a long time to be ready.
Would like to stay again. Didn't realise the staircase link to the Spice Girls until a friend said when I got home.
Room Tip: Grand Staircase Suite is worth the money See more room tips
